item.title: [RBX8][Dediated Servers] - R807R19/R807R20/R807R21
item.description:
Jul 7, 04:34 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/07/2023 03:48 UTC
End Time : 07/07/2023 04:29 UTC
Service impact : IPMI was temporarily unavailable for servers in racks R807R19, R807R20 and R807R21
Root cause : Multiple network equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 7, 04:29 UTC
Identified - Service impact : IPMI is currently reachable for servers in racks R807R20 and R807R21
Root cause : Multiple network equipment caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the incident of rack R807R19

Jul 7, 03:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/07/2023 03:48 UTC
Service impact : IPMI is temporarily unavailable for servers in racks R807R19, R807R20 and R807R21
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
